Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2010 08:35AM ootee wrote: I AM A 67 Y/O FEMALE WITH STAGE 1 GRADE 1 ESTROGEN AND PROGESTERON POSIVITE. I HAVE HAD A LUMPECTOMY WITH WENT FINE.  I DON'T PLAN ON HAVING RADS, JUST TAMOXIFEN. ANYONE ELSE HAD GOOD LUCK WITH THAT? MY AGE AND LOW GRADE MAKES ME A GOOD CANIDATE.  MY ONC WANTS ME TO HAVE RADS BUT I FEEL ITS OVERKILL.  AM I FOOLISH? IHAVE HEARD OF WOMEN MY AGE GOING THAT ROUTE.  KATHY
Posts.Title: Anyone with successful Lumpectomy stories momto3 ootee
